SEARCH
Package org.example.Barrel

Class BarrelImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
org.example.Barrel.BarrelImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, IBarrel
public class BarrelImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements IBarrel
Implementation of the IBarrel interface for RMI-based indexing and search services.

Handles word indexing, searching, synchronization, and connection with SQLite databases.

See Also:

    • BarrelImpl

      public BarrelImpl(String barrelName) throws RemoteException
      Constructs a new BarrelImpl instance using the specified barrel name to load configuration.
      Parameters:
      barrelName - Name identifier for the barrel (e.g., "barrel1" or "barrel2").
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If RMI or file loading fails.

  • Method Details

    • addToIndex

      public void addToIndex(Map<String,Integer> words, String url, List<String> toUrls, String titulo, String citaçao) throws RemoteException, SQLException
      Adds words and metadata to the inverse index database, ensuring thread-safety with write locking.
      Specified by:
      addToIndex in interface IBarrel
      Parameters:
      words - Map of words and their frequencies.
      url - URL the words are associated with.
      toUrls - List of URLs linked from this URL.
      titulo - Title of the document.
      citaçao - Citation/snippet from the document.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If RMI or SQL operations fail.
      SQLException - If a database error occurs.

    • search

      public List<SearchResult> search(ArrayList<String> words) throws RemoteException
      Searches the index for documents containing the given words.
      Specified by:
      search in interface IBarrel
      Parameters:
      words - List of search terms.
      Returns:
      List of SearchResult objects matching the search criteria.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote or database error occurs.

    • getFrequentWords

      public List<String> getFrequentWords() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves a list of the most frequent words indexed. This is based on the top 5% of frequency totals.
      Specified by:
      getFrequentWords in interface IBarrel
      Returns:
      List of frequently used words.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a database error occurs.
